    Obtain CNV results by gene

    getCnvGenesDf.Rd

    Extracts CNV results in form of barcode ~ pairs in a data.frame.

    getCnvGenesDf(object, add_meta = TRUE)

    Arguments

    object

    An object of class SPATA2 or, in case of S4 generics, objects of classes for which a method has been defined.

    add_meta

    Logical value. If TRUE, meta information obtained by getGenePosDf() every gene is added to the data.frame

    Value

    Data.frame.

    Contents

    Developed by Jan Kueckelhaus, Dieter-Henrik Heiland, Simon Frerich.
